title: Bournemouth 1-0 Everton: Key stats
title_page: Bournemouth 1-0 Everton: Key stats - BBC Sport
maintext:
Bournemouth are now unbeaten in eight Premier League games (W5 D3), their longest ever run without defeat in the top-flight.
The Cherries have scored more goals through substitutes than any other side in the Premier League this season, with their 10 goals from the bench also their most in a single top-flight campaign.
Only three sides - Liverpool, Chelsea and Manchester City - have had more shots on target in the Premier League than Bournemouth this season (114). The Cherries' average of 5.7 shots on target per game is their highest in a single campaign in the competition.
